title: Counter Panel
short-description: Dashboard to monitor all the Error Reports collected from Android Devices

title: Error Statistics Panel
short-description: Classification of Error Reports as per Android Version, Release, and Module

title: Graphical Analysis Panel
short-description: Gives a detailed analysis on the Error Per Release, MTBF, Errors Vs. Devices and more

title: Issue Analysis Panel
short-description: Error Log Data mining for analysing the Root cause of failure for any specific issue
